# Introduction

> THIS BOOK IS UNDER CONSTRUCTION

You can subscribe to Oscar's [newsletter](https://tinyletter.com/OscarBaruffa){target="_blank"} to be notified of major updates to the book. 

## The warmest of welcomes to you!
The R community is very active on Twitter. 
You can learn a lot about the language, about new approaches to problems, make friends and even land a job or next contract. 
It's a real-time pulse of the R community. 

![](images/welcome_to_rstats_twitter.png)

Artwork by [\@allison_horst](https://twitter.com/allison_horst){target="_blank"}

Start by downloading the Twitter app or visiting the [desktop site](https://twitter.com/){target="_blank"}. 
Create an account and you're good to go.

When your first start, you'll be prompted to follow some popular accounts. Go ahead and select a few. 
Don't worry about which you select, we'll show you how to unfollow accounts later. For now, just pick a few and continue.
